Bayonne.22nd Street (HBLR station):
22nd Street is a station with two side platforms, on the Hudson–Bergen Light Rail (HBLR) located above ground at Avenue E and East 22nd Street in Bayonne, New Jersey. It is served at all times by the Hoboken-8th Street Line.


== Description ==
The station was the terminus of the HLBR between its opening as a single station extension on November 15, 2003 to the opening of 8th Street, the next station south, on January 31, 2011.
